title: Spelunky
description: Spelunky is a unique platformer with randomized levels that offer a challenging new experience each time you play. Journey deep underground and explore fantastic places filled with all manner of monsters, traps, and treasure. You’ll have complete freedom while you navigate the fully-destructible environments and master their many secrets . To stay or flee, to kill or rescue, to shop or steal in Spelunky, the choice is yours and so are the consequences Plan B: Terraform

system_requirements.Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.8GHz or equivalent processor
